title: Two houses for sale in Boalwalana
details:
Newly built two separate (separate deeds). houses for sale in Bolawalana.5 minutes to Negombo city and 10 minutes drive to airport and beach.
one house has 4 bed rooms and 3 attached bathrooms.Two A/C rooms.fully tile and ceiling.pantry kitchen and outside small kitchen.
2 nd house complete 1 st floor with slab.complete two rooms with attached bathrooms.Living,room dining room and kitchen.fully tiled.with nice garden.
